about_the_game:
In "Bubble Chicken Farm," you'll explore vast unknown lands, build your own dream farm, take care of charming animals, grow a variety of exotic plants and create incredible structures. In addition, Bubble Chicken will play a key role, using his special powers to help you overcome challenges and make your farm even more magical.

Pirate adventure on the farm: Leave the pirate life behind and embark on a journey of exploration and discovery that will take you to fascinating places and on exciting quests.


Bubble Chicken, your trusty companion: Count on Bubble Chicken's magical help to overcome obstacles, uncover secrets and make your farm unique.

Farm management: Raise and care for a variety of adorable animals, plant exotic crops and customize your farm to reflect your style.

Creative construction: Develop your farm with personalized structures and charming decorations, transforming it into a rural paradise.

Online mode: Connect with other players to share tips, exchange resources and cooperate on common projects, or play in offline mode for a more intimate experience.

name: Bubble Chicken Farm Demo
short_description: "Bubble Chicken Farm" offers an immersive game experience where adventure, farm management and magic merge to create a world full of possibilities. Discover the joy of being a pirate-farmer and create your own legend in "Bubble Chicken Farm".
